response.overview: Heather O’Rourke captured hearts as Carol-Anne in the Poltergeist films, a bright light destined for greatness. Her sudden passing at just 12 years old left the world stunned and searching for answers. She Was Here looks beyond the headlines and rumors to honor the girl behind the role: her life, her spirit, and the legacy she left behind.
response.tagline: The Heartbreaking True Story of Child Actress and ‘Poltergeist’ Star, Heather O’Rourke.
response.title: She Was Here
